required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Current Outpatient Cardiac Rehabilitation in Austria

brief_summary.textblock: Aim of this study is to give evidence to outpatient cardiac rehabilitation in Austria. The database created in this context is supposed to pave the way as instrument to document and comprehend quality of outpatient cardiac rehabilitation in Austria as a key for quality management. Analyses of the created database should be made on a regular basis.

primary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in Physical Work Capacity (PWC) in Phase II rehabilitation
primary_outcome.description: PWC is measured by a graded exercise test on a cycle ergometer at start and end of outpatient cardiac rehabilitation

primary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in Physical Work Capacity (PWC) in Phase III rehabilitation
primary_outcome.description: PWC is measured by a graded exercise test on a cycle ergometer at start and end of outpatient cardiac rehabilitation

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in Cholesterol in Phase II rehabilitation
secondary_outcome.description: Venous blood samples are taken to assess Cholesterol

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in Cholesterol in Phase III rehabilitation
secondary_outcome.description: Venous blood samples are taken to assess Cholesterol

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in Triglycerides in Phase II rehabilitation
secondary_outcome.description: Venous blood samples are taken to assess Triglycerides

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in Triglycerides in Phase III rehabilitation
secondary_outcome.description: Venous blood samples are taken to assess Triglycerides

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in Blood Glucose in Phase II rehabilitation
secondary_outcome.description: Venous blood samples are taken to assess blood glucose

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from baseline in Blood Glucose in Phase III rehabilitation
secondary_outcome.description: Venous blood samples are taken to assess blood glucose

intervention.description: 50min of endurance training combined with 50min of calisthenics; 1-3x/wekk; 6weeks up to 1year

study_pop.textblock: Patients who qualified for an outpatient cardiac rehabilitation

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
Any patient who meets inclusion criteria for outpatient cardiac rehabilitation in Austria -
Exclusion Criteria:
- Medical conditions which prevent patients from complying with the exercise program
- Acute infections
- Hypertrophic cardiomyopathy
- Pulmonary artery embolism or phlebothrombosis within the previous 6 months
- Unstable angina pectoris
- Heart failure (NYHA IV)
- Hemodynamically unstable arrhythmia

overall_official.last_name: Prof. Josef Niebauer, MD, PhD, MBA
overall_official.affiliation: Institute of Sports Medicine, Prevention and Rehabilitation Paracelsus Medical University Salzburg, Austria
